descriptionHtml:
Lex Silver is a Breton Vampire follower who prefers 1H weapons, light armour, and will level with the player character. 

Location
 ========
 She resides in the Windpeak Inn at Dawnstar.

 Details
 =======
 Lex Silver was the happy-go-lucky debutante daughter of a wealthy merchant before she was embraced with the dark kiss and abandoned by her maker. After spending several years roaming from nest to nest and heading further north she arrived in Skyrim and joined the Dark Brotherhood. During a raid on the Dawnstar sanctuary, her private quarters buried under several tonnes of rock. There she lay in torpor for many years as her body slowly began to repair.

 Awoken, just days before the dragon attack on Helgen. She has regained some of her former strength and feeds on wayward travellers around the Dawnstar area. She now craves to return to the hunt. Having heard of the Dovahkin rising she is keen to meet him/her and offer her services.

 Install
 =======
 I would strongly recommend using NMM to install any mod including this one as it will be much easier to uninstall it if you don\'t like it.

 Manual Installation
 - = or = -
 NMM Installation

 Manual Install
 --------------
 1. Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to Skyrim\'s Data
 folder.
 2. Start Skyrim Launcher and enable the GJMLexSilver.esp file.

 Uninstall
 =========
 Pick which method you are going to use for uninstall based on how you installed it:

 Manual Uninstall
 - = or = -
 NMM Uninstall

 Manual Uninstall
 ----------------
 1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
 2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

 Upgrade
 =======
 This is version 1.0 with no previous versions at this time. 

 Incompatibility
 ===============
 I\'m not aware of any issues at this time but please let me know if you encounter any.

 Known Issues or Bugs
 ====================
 None as yet - but I\'m sure they\'ll come at some point!
